artist: Tsukioka Yoshitoshi; Publisher: Fukuda Kumajirō; Carver: Watanabe Yatarō
creditline: The Mary Griggs Burke Endowment Fund established by the Mary Livingston Griggs and Mary Griggs Burke Foundation, gifts of various donors, by exchange, and gift of Edmond Freis in memory of his parents, Rose and Leon Freis
dimension: 14 1/2 × 10 in. (36.83 × 25.4 cm) (sheet, each, approx., vertical ōban triptych)
inscription: 関守に酒ふるまわむゆるさくら {Sekimori ni sake furu mawamu yuru sakura} .
markings: Artist’s seals: 芳年 {Yoshitoshi}, 大蘇 {Taiso} | Carver’s seal: 彫弥太 {Hori Yata}
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e), ink and color on paper
signed: 己卯如月大蘇芳年写 {tsuchinotou kisaragi Taiso Yoshitoshi sha}
text: Related to the play Akamatsu Man'yū ume no shirahata 赤松満祐梅白旗, performed at the Shin-Tomi Theater in February 1879.
title: Actor Ichikawa Danjūrō IX as Benkei
